TextBlock.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color>: I'm glad to be on my own. I've been planning to do this for a while now, I just needed to wait for the right conditions.
Ever since my younger days when no one appreciated my talk of space trains being the next big thing for Nomai-kind, I've been planning to get away from my clan to build it all myself.
I knew it could be done. I simply needed planets that were small enough with at least one with a potent energy source.
After identifying this system as my target destination, I quietly hijacked one of the escape pods from my <color=orange>vessel</color>, I managed to leave undetected.

To prevent my clan from finding and stopping me before I finish construction, I've set up this One-Way beacon. It'll make it harder for them to track me down and it'll still let me get back to them once I finish the train's warp functionality.
I'm almost done... Please let this buy me enough time.
